thread.title: Newswire: California to secede from America (in comic book form)
thread.title_full: Newswire: California to secede from America (in comic book form)

author: Danette Chavez
title: Newswire: California to secede from America (in comic book form)
text:
Share Tweet 
With California’s secession movement gaining momentum, it was only a matter of time before someone turned the state’s dissent into art. Young Terrorists creators Matteo Pizzolo and Amancay Nahuelpan have stepped up with Calexit , a “near-future, alternate reality comic” that imagines a world in which Californians told the rest of the country to fuck off. Well, that’s being a bit glib— Calexit tells the tale of an autocratic American president who wants to deport all immigrants, which prompts California to declare itself a sanctuary state. With its fictional Los Angeles under martial law ( that’s going around ), the story then follows a young smuggler and a resistance leader who are trying to escape occupied territory and make it to the now autonomous California. Image: Calexit/Black Mask Comics 
Calexit also seeks to inform readers including information on real-life Senate and House seat midterm elections in 2018. You can get inspired (or depressed) when Calexit debuts in May. 
[ via io9 , which, like The A.V. Club , is owned by Univision Communications.]
